commands.name: az workloads sap-availability-zone-detail
commands.summary: Show the recommended SAP Availability Zone Pair Details for your region.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-availability-zone-detail [--app-location]
                                          [--database-type {DB2, HANA}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--location]
                                          [--sap-product {ECC, Other, S4HANA}]
                                          [--subscription]

commands.name: az workloads sap-disk-configuration
commands.summary: Show the SAP Disk Configuration Layout prod/non-prod SAP System.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-disk-configuration [--app-location]
                                    [--database-type {DB2, HANA}]
                                    [--db-vm-sku]
                                    [--deployment-type {SingleServer, ThreeTier}]
                                    [--environment {NonProd, Prod}]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--location]
                                    [--sap-product {ECC, Other, S4HANA}]
                                    [--subscription]
examples: az workloads sap-disk-configuration --app-location eastus --database-type HANA --db-vm-sku Standard_M32ts --deployment-type SingleServer --environment NonProd --sap-product S4HANA --location eastus

commands.name: az workloads sap-sizing-recommendation
commands.summary: Show SAP sizing recommendations by providing input SAPS for application tier and memory required for database tier.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-sizing-recommendation [--app-location]
                                       [--database-type {DB2, HANA}]
                                       [--db-memory]
                                       [--db-scale-method {ScaleUp}]
                                       [--deployment-type {SingleServer, ThreeTier}]
                                       [--environment {NonProd, Prod}]
                                       [--high-availability-type {AvailabilitySet, AvailabilityZone}]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--location]
                                       [--sap-product {ECC, Other, S4HANA}]
                                       [--saps]
                                       [--subscription]

commands.name: az workloads sap-supported-sku
commands.summary: Show a list of SAP supported SKUs for ASCS, Application and Database tier.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-supported-sku [--app-location]
                               [--database-type {DB2, HANA}]
                               [--deployment-type {SingleServer, ThreeTier}]
                               [--environment {NonProd, Prod}]
                               [--high-availability-type {AvailabilitySet, AvailabilityZone}]
                               [--ids]
                               [--location]
                               [--sap-product {ECC, Other, S4HANA}]
                               [--subscription]
